news.headline: Jeff Bezos Says He 'Won the Lottery' With His Teen Mom—She Had Him at 17, Took Him to Night School, Then Invested Her $245K Savings In Amazon
news.summary: Before Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) became a $2 trillion tech giant, it was just an idea—and Jeff Bezos had something better than venture capital: his mom. "I won the lottery with my mom. news.headline: Donald Trump Vows To 'Call' Up CEOs Who Make Business Moves That Displease Him, Explains Why He Phoned Jeff Bezos To Scrap Amazon's Tariff Disclosure
news.summary: President Donald Trump says he will personally phone chief executives who make business moves he dislikes, a tactic he deployed last week with Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) founder Jeff Bezos over planned tariff disclosures on the e‑commerce giant's site. news.headline: Zoox Issues Voluntary Recall of 270 Autonomous Cars Over Software Error
news.summary: By Roshan Fernandez Autonomous car maker Zoox, an Amazon.com subsidiary, has issued a voluntary recall of 270 of its vehicles after it found a software error that may increase the risk of a crash....
